DOC.brief_summary: Endotracheal intubation ( ETI ) perceive optimal method provide maintain clear secure airway . The 2010 European Resuscitation Council ( ERC ) guideline emphasize importance minimal interruption cardiopulmonary resuscitation ( CPR ) . These guideline also suggest skilled operator able secure airway without interrupt chest compression . The aim study compare time success rate Vividtrac video-laryngoscope Miller laryngoscope emergency intubation simulate pediatric CPR .
DOC.criteria: Give voluntary consent participate study Paramedic student Not meet criterion Wrist Low back diseases
